history.proof: intros Hlim Hexp. hauto use: is_lim_seq_subseq, is_lim_seq_unique, Lim_seq_ext_loc unfold: ex_lim_seq, eventually.

ctx: apply is_LimSup_seq_ext_loc with (u := fun n => u (phi n)).
exceptions.exn: In environment u : nat -> R phi : nat -> nat Hlim : filterlim phi eventually eventually Hexp : ex_lim_seq u Unable to unify "forall P : ?V -> Prop, locally zero P -> filtermap ?M2375 ?F P" with "exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> (fun n0 : nat => u (phi n0) = u (phi n0)) n".

exceptions.exn: In environment u : nat -> R phi : nat -> nat Hlim : filterlim phi eventually eventually Hexp : ex_lim_seq u Unable to unify "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally (Lim_seq ?M3270) P -> filtermap ?M3270 eventually P" with "match Lim_seq u with | Finite l => forall eps : posreal, (forall N : nat, exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ l - eps < u n) /\\ (exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> u n < l + eps) | p_infty => forall (M : R) (N : nat), exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ M < u n | m_infty => forall M : R, exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> u n < M end".

ctx: apply is_LimSup_seq_ext_loc with (u := fun n => u (phi n)).
exceptions.exn: In environment u : nat -> R phi : nat -> nat Hlim : filterlim phi eventually eventually Hexp : ex_lim_seq u H1 : forall f : ?U1 -> ?V1, filterlim (fun x : ?U1 => norm (f x)) ?F1 (locally 0) -> filterlim f ?F1 (locally zero) H0 : forall phi : nat -> nat, (forall n : nat, (phi n < phi (S n))%nat) -> filterlim phi eventually eventually H : forall u : nat -> R, ex_lim_seq u -> is_lim_seq u (Lim_seq u) Unable to unify "ex_lim_seq u" with "is_LimSup_seq u (Lim_seq u)".

original: intros Hlim Hexp. apply is_lim_seq_unique. apply is_LimSup_LimInf_lim_seq. - apply is_LimSup_seq_ext_loc with (u := fun n => u (phi n)). + apply filterlim_norm_zero. now apply eventually_subseq. + apply is_LimSup_seq_ext_loc with (u := u). * apply filterlim_norm_zero. now apply eventually_subseq. * apply Lim_seq_correct. apply Hexp. - apply is_LimInf_seq_ext_loc with (u := fun n => u (phi n)). + apply filterlim_norm_zero. now apply eventually_subseq. + apply is_LimInf_seq_ext_loc with (u := u). * apply filterlim_norm_zero. now apply eventually_subseq. * apply Lim_seq_correct. apply Hexp.
